context.text: Kamal Haasan filmography - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Year Title Role Co-Stars Language Notes
^ Rangarajan, M. 2007. The write move. The Hindu, 26 October. Available from: http://www.hindu.com/cp/2007/10/26/stories/2007102650010100.htm . Accessed 29 February 2008.

The following is the filmography of Kamal Haasan , a four-time National Film Award -winning Indian actor , writer , film director , singer , comedian and lyricist . Throughout his career, Haasan has worked under multiple faculties on many projects, as either the writer, director, actor, or any combination of the three.
Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources . Unverifiable material may be challenged and removed.
This article does not cite any references or sources . (March 2008)
